title: Albion Online MMO Game Website - Desktop
caption: Desktop size home page
content:
Website for a MMO game.
Web developed in PHP/Symfony2 (Twig templates)
Zurb's foundation as responsive framework + custom SASS styles.
Frontend coded in both Javascript and Coffeescript.
Assets compilation / optimization thru Grunt tasks.
PostgreSQL + MySQL (forum) databases.
Integration of payment (adyen), helpdesk (ZendDesk), mailing (Mandrill), google (Tag Manager / Analytics) and social (FB, twitter, etc) web services.
Provisioning thru puppet + hiera.

title: Albion Online MMO Game Forum
caption: Forum home page
content:
Forum for a MMO game.
Developed using wbb

title: Schalke04 Bonusprogram - Desktop
caption: Desktop size Earns page
content:
Website for Fan Loyalty solution (Bonusprogram).
Developed in dotCMS (Velocity templates)
Own responsive framework / grid system + custom LESS styles.
Frontend coded in both Javascript and Coffeescript, own MVC component-based framework. AMD modules + require.js
Assets compilation / optimization thru Grunt tasks.
Middleware API in Node.js (Restify.js + MongoDB)
Integration of affiliate networks (affilinet, zanox, phg, etc) thru own API, developed with PHP (Laravel Framework) + MySQL + Redis
Integration of google (Tag Manager / Analytics), Sportfive (Football matches events) and social (FB, twitter, Instagram, etc) web services.
Provisioning thru puppet, massive use of AWS services (EC2, S3, CDN, etc..)

title: Battle For Gea
caption: Home page
content:
Real time cards based online game.
Web built with PHP/Symfony/MySQL.
In-game managed by NodeJS/Socket.io/RabbitMQ/MongoDB.
The frontend is coded in both Javascript and Coffeescript with massive use of jQuery and HTML5 canvas.
Styles are coded in Stylus preprocessor with huge number of transitions/animations.

title: LogQuest
caption: Dashboard page
content:
Project Team management gamified social network.
Backend developed in PHP/Wordpress (JSON API)
Frontend in Coffeescript/Backbone/RequireJS, canvas, LESS.

title: Hat Party
caption: Race page
content:
Brainstorming Game Web, your horse wins if you submit more relevant ideas.
Real time game thru websockets.
Backend developed in Google Go + socket.io + MySQL.
Frontend in Javascript, canvas, LESS.
Headless testing with ZombieJS

title: Data Play
caption: Network Chart Page
content:
Data visualization Web.
Developed using d3.js and SVG for data visualization.
Backend in Google Go/MySQL
Frontend in Coffeescript/LESS.

title: IKSeeM
caption: Documents Box page
content:
Environmental management portal for Basque Government.
Developed in J2EE, Struts 1.2, Weblogic, Oracle.
Frontend Javascript+jQuery.

title: NOC Web
caption: ModBus Electrical monitoring
content:
Datacenter management portal.
Developed for management/monitoring on datacenter inventory/equipment.
Backend in PHP/MySQL
Frontend HTML/CSS/Javascript
Diverse network protocols (TCP, SNMP, Modbus, ...)

title: About Frontcoder
caption: Bio / Timeline page
content:

title: Testing Web
